creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation
description: small rectangular chest with flared base to be worn as a backpack; black lacquer with gold round crest on front featuring three rounded leaves against black triangle pattern; 8 drawers inside of varying shapes that fit the irregular shape of the box; navy blue, rough silk cord laced through back
medium: Lacquered pine and zeklova wood, iron, gold pigment, silk rope
title: Ammunition backpack
